Package org.pepstock.charba.client.ml

Class RegressionBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.ml.RegressionBuilder
  • public final class RegressionBuilder
extends Object
    Builds regressions instances.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static IsRegression build​(IsRegression regression)

      Creates new regression, using the passed regression descriptor instance to create new regression.

      Creates a exponential regression.

      It uses the default degree, 2.

      Creates a polynomial regression.

      Creates new regression builder, using the passed regression descriptor instance to create new regression.

      Sets samples, using the passed Y values.
      X values are creating starting from 0 with increment of 1.

      • setSamples

                          double starting)
        Sets samples, using the passed Y values.

        starting - starting value to create X values
        Returns:
        regression builder instance

      • setSamples

        public T setSamples​(List<Double> y,
                    double starting,
                    double increment)
        Sets samples, using the passed Y values.
        X values are creating starting from passed argument with increment of passed argument.
        Parameters:
        y - Y values to use to create the regression
        starting - starting value to create X values
        increment - increment to apply to the starting value
        Returns:
        regression builder instance
